subject: Basketball
Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
lead_paragraph: The $200 million Mikhail D. Prokhorov is putting up for an 80 percent share of the Nets is much less than what Bruce C. Ratner paid for the team in 2004.
snippet: The $200 million Mikhail D. Prokhorov is putting up for an 80 percent share of the Nets is much less than what Bruce C. Ratner paid for the team in 2004.
